author: mschulte
msg: fix for TAPESTRY-2530 and TAPESTR.Y-2382. Replaces commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool with a custom version synchronizing slightly less aggressively.

author: bago
msg: Make sure we close the tags we open

author: bago
msg: Fix a documentatin issue for Matchers (getMatcherInfo was not correctly reported).

author: veithen
msg: * Allow poll intervals to be specified in milliseconds (by appending "ms" to the parameter value).
* Corrected a unit mismatch between the DEFAULT_POLL_INTERVAL constant and the pollInterval argument of the schedulePoll method.
* Reduced the poll interval to 50ms to reduce the execution time of the tests.
